name: smart phone Wallet / Upholstery Fabric
description:
This is going to be your favorite way to carry your smart phone/iphone, credit cards and money! This phone wallet bag is made of high quality upholstery fabric. The outside front of the bag features a credit card pocket, as does the back (behind the cover flap). Your phone will be safely protected in the middle pouch which is fully lined. All 3 opening are securely fastened shut with a velcro closure. 

Dimensions:
4 inches wide
6 inches long

Fabric:
Red and Cream White upholstery fabric
bag is fully lined

name: smart phone Wallet Bag / Upholstery Fabric-2
description:
This is going to be your favorite way to carry your smart phone/iphone, credit cards and money! This phone wallet bag is made of high quality upholstery fabric. The outside front of the bag features a credit card pocket, as does the back (behind the cover flap). Your phone will be safely protected in the middle pouch which is fully lined. All 3 opening are securely fastened shut with a velcro closure. The strap of this bag is long enough to be worn diagonally cross body, over the shoulder or simply hanging in front of body from neck.

Dimensions:
4 inches wide
6 inches long
44 inch strap

Fabric:
red, green and cream white upholstery fabric
strong, black strap
bag is fully lined

name: ipad iphone Messenger Bag / Upholstery Fabric / Made to Order in any color
description:
This bag does double duty! It is made to securely carry both your ipad and iphone (or other smartphone).

This fully lined (and padded) bag is made of a high quality upholstery fabric. The front of the bag has a pocket specifically sized to house your iphone or other smartphone. The main section measures perfectly for securing your ipad (gen 1 or 2). There is another roomy pocket behind the cover flap which can function as a storage compartment for the ipad charger. All 3 sections are secured with a strong velcro closure. The bag strap is long enough to comfortably wear cross body.

Dimensions:
8 and 1/2 inches across body of bag
10 and 1/2 inches in length
44 inch strap

Please convo me prior to purchase to let me know what color is desired and to check for specific upholstery fabric availabilities.

name: smart phone Wallet Bag / Upholstery Fabric
description:
This is going to be your favorite way to carry your iphone, credit cards and money!  This iphone wallet bag is made of very high quality upholstery fabric.  The outside front of the bag features a credit card pocket, as does the back (behind the cover flap).  Your iphone will be safely protected in the middle pouch which is fully lined.  All 3 opening are securely fastened shut with a velcro closure.  The strap of this bag is long enough to be worn diagonally cross body, over the shoulder or simply hanging in front of body from neck.

Dimensions:
       3 inches wide
       5 and 1/2 inches long
       44 inch strap

Fabric:
      chocolate brown upholstery fabric with velvet accent circles (body, and 2 pockets)
      strong cream white tailor's tape strap
      bag is fully lined

name: kindle case / kindle cover / kindle sleeve / kindle 3 case / ereader/ nook
description:
This is a padded sleeve case for a Kindle 3 or other eReader . This case provides great protection for your kindle eReader from dust and scrapes. The sleeve is a beautiful way to transport your reader in style.

The outside of the case is of a high quality upholstery fabric. The colors of this specific sleeve are black and white with a red loop and button. The buyer can request made to order colors, however.

-----------------------------------------------------
IMPORTANT!
Please indicate in the message to seller at checkout if you are purchasing this sleeve for the following:

1. New Kindle 4 (non-keyboard, non-touch)
2. New Kindle with Keyboard
3. New Kindle Touch
4. New Kindle Fire
5. Kindle 1, 2 or 3
6. Nook
7. Nook Color
8. Nook Simple Touch


If no message is left, this sleeve will be sized for the Kindle 3. Thank you!
